SKILLS.NAME: Block
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: Liam wields his massive sword defensively, using it to block incoming attacks with a %s damage reduction.

SKILLS.NAME: Block
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: Liam wields his massive sword defensively, using it to block incoming attacks with a %s damage reduction. It has %s charges, but the cooldown is higher

ARTIFACTS.NAME: Campfire
ARTIFACTS.DESCRIPTION: Heal all the party by 100 hp per second. only used out of combat.

ARTIFACTS.NAME: Warrior's Emblem
ARTIFACTS.DESCRIPTION: increases attack power by 10% for 10 seconds.

ARTIFACTS.NAME: Shield of Valor
ARTIFACTS.DESCRIPTION: Receive a shield that absorbs 400 damage for 10 seconds.

TROPHIES.NAME: Summon Trophy
TROPHIES.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage from summoned creatures by 10%.
